title: Ma ga Ochiru Yoru (The Night When Evil Falls)
synopsis: Sheliss Elleness Zurbach suddenly appears out of the blue in modern day Tokyo. Destiny has brought her to the human world, destiny in the form of an evil adversary named Gilva. Needing help in tracking down her enemy, she enlists a sexy demon killer.
staff: [['Murayama, Kousuke', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director', ' Chief Animation Director']]]
